scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run build --prefix frontend"
scripts.i:all: concurrently "npm i" "npm audit fix --force" "npm i --prefix backend" "npm audit fix --force --prefix backend" "npm i --prefix frontend" "npm audit fix --force --prefix frontend"
